page.title: 17SHOPPING IN LOWER PENARTH
page.content: There are about{2112 dwellings,4 local {shops,one a Post Office,one a Craft shop.These shops are used by the local people for daily and weekly shopping. Most residents shop weekly at{super_ {markets}on the outskirts of Penarth, Barry or Cardiff,where car parks are provided.Some shop in the Town where there is a lack of{off_street parking. Very few use Public Transport or walk! A proposal to build a{Superstore}Post_ Office,{Community Hall}by a Private Company was rejected by the Council, residents also objected.Their attitude was that a superstore near Cosmeston would change the character of the area Planning for a shop and hall on the site of a disused concrete works has been granted.This would be useful for residents and particularly old people. There is little trading apart from a {rural craftshop}used by visitors.
